import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Form, Img } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' const ProductScreen = ({ match, history }) => { const [qty, setQty] = useState(1) const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const { loading, error, product } = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin const addToCartHandler = () => { history.push(`/cart/${match.params.id}?qty=${qty}`) } return ( <> Back {loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (

{product.name}

 Price: {product.price} Description: {product.description} Price ${product.price} Status {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty setQty(e.target.value)} > {[...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map(x => ( ))} )} )} ) } export default ProductScreen
